job.title: Staff/Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Ranking, Feed, Relevance

learning recommendation systems deep learning feed relevance and data mining ltligtltligtExpert knowledge in Java or ScalaltligtltligtExperience with scripting languages such as Perl Python and shell scriptsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMS degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field with 3 years of machine learning related trade journals such as JMLR or Machine Learning or Presentations at related conferences such as ICML NeurIPS KDD SIGIR and etcltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe provide a highly competitive compensation package including base salary bonuses and stock options Benefits include great Medical Dental and Vision A flat organization and familylike culture makes this a perfect environment to make huge impact on our product and grow your skill set
